issues.message: Introduce a new variable or use its initial value before reassigning 'expected'.
Replace this generic exception class with a more specific one.
Introduce a new variable or use its initial value before reassigning 'current_if'.
Take the required action to fix the issue indicated by this "FIXME" comment.
Delete this unreachable code or refactor the code to make it reachable.
err_to_raise is used before it is defined. Move the definition before.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal 'api.json' 7 times.
Add an "alt" attribute to this image.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal '{"version": 1}' 3 times.
